title: Tofu keema curry
ingredients: ['450g firm tofu', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '150g frozen peas, thawed', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '180g chopped fresh tomatoes', 'salt to taste', '1 fresh jalapeno chilli, chopped']
